projects.title: GoghLand
projects.bodyText:
- A sandbox-style multiplayer social game where players create avatars, customize homes and words, host events.
 - Built login and sign-up with Firebase + Social Auth (Google, Facebook, Twitter).
 - Developed multiplayer features with Photon Fusion
 - Built systems for 3D avatar customization and home decoration.
 - Designed & developed an in-game timeline editor for 3D music shows, allowing users to choreograph avatars, effects, and stage setups.

projects.title: Hado The Hunter
projects.bodyText:
- A Online 2-player AR Shooter Mobile Game for Android & iOS
- Developed the logic for shoting, scoring. and syncing data across the network.
- Worked with artist. Handled UI/UX development. Handled scene visuals and animations.

projects.title: Virtual Exhibition Game
projects.bodyText:
- A web-based 3D multiplayer exhibition game where users explore booths, customize avatars, interact with others.
- Built multiplayer features including matchmaking, movement sync, emote interaction, and 2-player quiz battles.
- Created interactive booths for players to explore and engage with content.
- Optimized build size and game logic for faster loading and smoother performance.

projects.title: Virtual Office App
projects.bodyText:
- A web-based 3D virtual office where users interact via avatars, chat in real time, hold video meetings with screen sharing.
- Built a 3D virtual office web app using React.js & Three.js, allowing users to join rooms and control avatars in real time.
- Implemented multiplayer functionality in backend (Node.js + WebSocket), synchronize avatar movement + text chat.
- Developed a meeting feature using WebRTC for video conferencing and screen sharing, similar to Google Meet.
